Articles.Content:
Is there a way to set your lights to turn on and off intermittently? Like I want to chase lights across the length of my ship to identify it easier in dark space. Is there a way to set this up in action groups?

Edited November 21, 2014 by TheHypnotoad

Aviation Lights

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/16925-0-25-Aviation-Lights-v3-6-%2803MAY14%29

Also Safety Lights from:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86695-0-25-USI-Exploration-Pack-Small-parts-big-adventure!-v-0-2-5-2014-11-01

Edited November 20, 2014 by kerbiloid
Addition
You can't, but you can use action groups to your advantage (1 for on, 2 for off?)

Yeah I did set up the control groups to do toggles, 1 on 3 off, 2 on 1 off, 3 on 2 off.

Kinda pointless if i do it myself though. I want to set it up for docking and stuff

Def checking this mod out though, thank you Kerbiloid

Be warned that there is a limit on how many light-sources KSP will light parts with. If this is a problem, you might want to look at GlowStrips; they're "Emissives" rather than "Lights", which means they glow but don't try to light up other parts.

Another part that needs to be stockified.

Squad: moar lights, please!
